name: Aladine
text: When this Character would be K.O.'d by 1 of your opponent's effects, you may trash one hand and rest one DON!! card. If you do, play up to one (Fish-Man) or (Merfolk) type Character with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.

effect.text: When this Character would be K.O.'d by 1 of your opponent's effects, you may trash one hand and rest one DON!! card. If you do, play up to one (Fish-Man) or (Merfolk) type Character with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.
